r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Fixed PECL bug #6595 (segfault in addServer()) - Fixed PECL bug #6512 (buffer overrun in getVersion()) - Fixed PECL bug #6460 (lacking include of php_smart_str_public.h) - Fixed PECL bug #6370 (incorrect failover on out-of-memory server errors) - Improved zlib detection
